name: God of Riffs - Free Demo
description:
ARE YOU READY TO ROCK? 

Step into a heavy metal album come to life! 

Become the GOD OF RIFFS. Wield twin guitar axes with the fury of a METAL GOD against swarms of skulls, skeletons, and more across the multiverse in this new pulse-pounding rhythm melee VR game!

Charge your weapons with heavy metal combos that send enemies flying and carve your name into heavy metal HIGH SCORE HISTORY! 

This DEMO contains a headbanging original track in 2 difficulty modes (plus a tutorial) and 1 unique level. 

The Full Version is coming soon to the Quest store and Steam and has 8 high-octane original tracks in 4 difficulty modes, across 6 unique levels spanning the metal multiverse.

ENOUGH TALK. LET’S ROCK.

God of Riffs is currently in Early Access on Steam: 

 https://store.steampowered.com/app/1578110/God_of_Riffs/

The full version is coming mid 2022.
